module.name: FlowPlayer
module.description: This module extends ATutor [media] tag to display .flv file with the built in flowplayer Flash player. No special permissions, tools tabs or icons are defined. Once installed just enter the path to a local flv file or URL to a remote flv file in between media tags.

release.notes: The browser on linux OS may have problem accessing remote flv file. This module is only for ATutor 1.6.3+. For 1.6.3, please install patch 04 before enabling this module.
